body: Hey everyone I'm Vodnuth, I've played avicus on and off for a few years now and I really enjoy the community. I've only recently started increasing my prescence on the server and that's why I'm here on the forums to introduce myself. I'm interested in applying for Jr Mod when I feel like I'm qualified. You may or may not know Glesmon who's my brother and shadowolf365 who is a good friend of mine. Feel free to ask me anything about my life or about minecraft or avicus :)

title: AMA Vodnuth

replies.body: Where do you live? Favourite Food? Favourite Drink? Favourite Animal? Favourite Food? Why did you break the sign on the build server? Do you live Avicus? Rate it 1-10
